topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
Though, honest answer here.

Is this worth it? If I ever have the chance to do this, if I ever could do this, is this worth it? Is it worth it, sending a letter, making everyone read it and start a riot? Is it worth it, writing this so that everyone will know how I think, while having the larger-than-slight chance that someone will try to trace this, find me and probably try to hurt me really bad? Is it worth telling the world the cold truth no matter how much they're going to fight against it and how this may cost lives?

Is it worth it to open the eyes of the next generation?
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553ce7fa6368721413611e00#post_553ce7fa6368721413611e00
The only one that can truly answer that question is you.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553ce9046368721413ee1f00#post_553ce9046368721413ee1f00
It feels life-threatening but I seriously feel that the world really deserves it.

So what if you have to change? That part of the process of growing up. Perseverance brings you success but sometimes, you just gotta change lanes when it's a dead end.
